In England, in the seven days to 02 March, there were 39,371 new confirmed cases (69.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 February, there were 60,792 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 35% (21,421 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 March is 3,694,339 (6,563.4 cases per 100,000 population).
